definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: I'm dying to see my sweetheart.
A beautiful girl came out on the balcony with her lover.
sentences.chinese: 一位美麗的姑娘同她的心上人走上了天台。

sentences.english: The man had once been Aunt Cordelia's sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 她是約翰兒時的心上人。

sentences.english: I give all my love to you this New year.
sentences.chinese: 你的心上人獻給你一個溫柔的新年之吻。

sentences.english: As I have said before, a pen send by a lover is different from the one you get from the shop.
sentences.chinese: 一支筆，心上人送的與商店買的是不一樣的。

sentences.english: She longs for the early return of her beloved.
sentences.chinese: 她盼着心上人早日歸來。

sentences.english: Without no seams nor needle work, then he'll be a true love of mine.
sentences.chinese: 沒有縫口，也不用針線，那麼他就會是我的心上人。

sentences.english: He said that he had had his own love, his eyes misting .
sentences.chinese: 他說自己已經有了心上人，這時他的眼睛溼潤了。

sentences.english: 13—Tell us who is your sweetheart, spoke Edy Boardman.
I have your letter, my adorable love.
sentences.chinese: 我收到了你的信，我崇拜的心上人。

sentences.english: The telephone becomes an instrument of torture in the demonic hands of a beloved who doesn't ring.
sentences.chinese: 心上人不給我打電話，電話成了她魔手中的一件刑具。

sentences.english: Here’s a tender Christmas kiss from you know who.
sentences.chinese: 你的心上人獻給你一個溫柔的聖誕之吻。

sentences.english: And gather it all in a bunch of heather, then he'll be a true love of mine.
sentences.chinese: 再用石南草紮成一捆，那麼他就會是我的心上人。

sentences.english: Every Word Acacia language, sentence lingering feelings, write poetry to make red beans, gave sweetheart.
sentences.chinese: 字字相思語，句句纏綿情，寫盡紅豆詩，送給心上人。

sentences.english: To Josephine I have your letter, my adorable love.
sentences.chinese: 我收到了你的信，我祟拜的心上人。

sentences.english: That good-hearted girl married her "prince" finally.
sentences.chinese: 那個好心女孩終於嫁給了她的心上人。

definition: sweetheart/one's true love/the person of one's thoughts
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to yearn for sth day and night (idiom)
to make a pledge to be married, without parents' approval
